description: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT Author: Florian Roth, Tom Ueltschi, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Adwind RAT / JRAT
query: ((process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Oracle* AND process.command_line:*\\java* AND process.command_line:*.exe\ *) OR (process.command_line:*cscript.exe* AND process.command_line:*Retrive* AND process.command_line:*.vbs\ *))
